actions.text: Amendment SA 1055 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 200.
Amendment SA 1055 proposed by Senator Wicker to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3587-3588) To establish the Office of the Lead Inspector General for Ukraine Assistance.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1055 proposed by Senator Wicker to Amendment SA 935.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1055 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 200.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1055 under the order of 7/26/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 200.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To establish the Office of the Lead Inspector General for Ukraine Assistance.
